On this page

Online Shop Websites ‚Äã

Online Shop Websites; or commonly known as eCommerce websites is a system by itself on top of the main website.

Capable of handling thousands of sales transactions. Online Shop Websites is everything you need for your online empire for your brick & mortar business.

Our starting points:

  • Voyage - Everything you need to get started & grow faster.
  • Turbo - Enhanced User Loyalty and Intuitive Navigation
  • Odyssey - Tailored Website Photography

üí°

Think of it as your online version of shop manager, cashier, shelves, bills, salesperson all combined into a single billing.

Pricing ‚Äã

Includes necessary tools for sales, marketing & lead generation features.

Development Details

We offload traffic by splitting the development environment for landing pages, eCommerce and blog.

üí°Add-Ons

You may also want to refer to add-ons to customize your maintenance plan further. For example, you chose the cp3.5 maintenance plan, but want to add-on one business e-mail instead of getting the next tier (cp3.7) which includes extras you might not need.

Alternatively, if you require simple buy and sell solutions, consider just purchasing SKU Count add-ons.
